Termius has versions for iOS, Android, Windows, Mac OS, and Linux. Its main advantage is that it supports not only SSH but also other Telnet or Mosh protocols.
VirtualBox can simulate various types of computer devices and operating systems with only one computer device.

Heroku is a cloud platform that runs certain programming languages, Heroku supports programming languages such as Ruby, Node.js, React js, Next Js and many more.
Amazon Web Services is a collection of cloud computing-based services provided by Amazon since 2002.
